00001 #ifndef _REQUESTS_
00002 #define _REQUESTS_
00003 
00004 #define MAXPATH 256
00005 #define MAXCLIENTS 30
00006 /* Client requests */
00007 #define REQUEST_GET 1
00008 #define REQUEST_DIR 2
00009 #define REQUEST_SNIFF 3
00010 
00011 /* Server answers */
00012 #define ANSWER_OK      0
00013 #define ANSWER_UNKNOWN 1        /* unknown request */
00014 #define ANSWER_ERROR   2        /* error while processing request */
00015 
00016 struct request {
00017   int  kind;
00018   char path[MAXPATH]; /*for file path(get) and protocole name (sniff)also */
00019 };
00020 
00021 struct answer {
00022     int  ack;
00023     int  nbbytes;               /* for GET and sniff */
00024     int  errnum;                /* significant if ack == ERROR and != 0 */
00025 };
00026 
00027 /* Port number deduced from UID allowing many users on a sigle host */
00028 //#define PORT (IPPORT_USERRESERVED + getuid())
00029 #define PORT 8585

00032 int IP   [MAXCLIENTS];
